title: Client Crashed in Champ Select
body: Was in my series for Plat 4, and I was 1-1 on my final game, my client just randomly crashed ( on rito's end ) I lost my series and dropped to 90 LP FML. Fix your client rito I shouldn't have to suffer for this bs!

replies.body: I just had the same issue in a normal. As soon as the client went into champ select it crashed on me. I logged back in before my turn came up in champ select but it didn't reload champ select and still gave me a dodge timer. The only other program that I had running was teamspeak.

If your client randomly crashed in champion select, it may have been due to third party programs which is something we don't support for reasons like this.  If you are using play.tv or overwolf, remove them and you should be good to go.  Losing 10 LP suggests a frequency in [dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), so it's important to get this fixed up to prevent further problems like this.  Good luck in your ranked climb!
I was in champ select not game.
